cs.IT, cs.SP, cs.LG, cs.NA, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with the problem of recursively reconstructing sparse signal sequences from noisy measurements, which is a common topic in information theory (cs.IT) and signal processing (cs.SP). The paper also discusses the stability of the proposed algorithms, which is a topic in machine learning (cs.LG) and numerical analysis (cs.NA). Additionally, the paper mentions Monte Carlo simulations, which are commonly used in statistical inference (cs.SI).
